import React,{useEffect,Fragment} from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {getDetailsProducts,clearErrors} from "../../actions/productAction"; import {useAlert} from "react-alert"; import Loader from "../layouts/Loader"; import MetaData from "../layouts/MetaData"; import {Carousel} from "react-bootstrap"; const ProductDetails = ({match}) =>{ const dispatch = useDispatch(); const {loading,error,product} = useSelector(state=>state.productDetails) const alert= useAlert(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getDetailsProducts(match.params.id)); if(error){ alert.error(error); dispatch(clearErrors()); } },[dispatch,alert,error,match.params.id]) return ( {loading ? :(
{product.images && product.images.map(image => ( ))}

{product.name}

Product # {product._id}

({product.numOfReviews}Reviews)

{product.price}z≈Ç

- +

Status: 0 ? 'greenColor' : 'redColor'} >{product.stock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}

{product.description}

Sold by: {product.seller}

Submit Review
 )} ) } export default ProductDetails;
